actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To clarify that fly ash from municipal solid waste incinerators shall be regulated under subtitle C of the Solid Waste Disposal Act.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide that the treatment, storage, disposal, or management of municipal solid waste incinerator fly ash shall be regulated under the subtitle governing hazardous waste.

titles.title: To clarify that fly ash from municipal solid waste incinerators shall be regulated under subtitle C of the Solid Waste Disposal Act.
